|Bellatrix Lestrange
|Bellatrix Lestrange
â
|Participated in the torture and the permanent incapacitation of [[Frank and Alice Longbottom]] using the [[Cruciatus Curse]]. Escaped prison fourteen years later to rejoin Voldemort. Tortured [[Dumbledore's Army#Neville Longbottom|Neville Longbottom]], seriously injured [[Nymphadora Tonks]], and murdered [[Order of the Phoenix (organisation)#Sirius Black|Sirius Black]] in the break-in at the [[Ministry of Magic#Department of Mysteries|Department of Mysteries]]. Tortured Hermione Granger and [[Griphook]], and murdered [[Magical creatures (Harry Potter)#Dobby|Dobby]] at Malfoy Manor. Murdered Tonks and attempted to murder [[Ginny Weasley]] during the Battle of Hogwarts.<ref name=webchat/> Subsequently killed by [[Molly Weasley]]. Also, Helena Bonham Carter has been described as 'perfect' for the role by many people.
+
|Participated in the torture and the permanent incapacitation of [[Frank and Alice Longbottom]] using the [[Cruciatus Curse]]. Escaped prison fourteen years later to rejoin Voldemort. Tortured [[Dumbledore's Army#Neville Longbottom|Neville Longbottom]], seriously injured [[Nymphadora Tonks]], and murdered [[Order of the Phoenix (organisation)#Sirius Black|Sirius Black]] in the break-in at the [[Ministry of Magic#Department of Mysteries|Department of Mysteries]]. Tortured Hermione Granger and [[Griphook]], and murdered [[Magical creatures (Harry Potter)#Dobby|Dobby]] at Malfoy Manor. Murdered Tonks and attempted to murder [[Ginny Weasley]] during the Battle of Hogwarts.<ref name=webchat/> Subsequently killed by [[Molly Weasley]].
